item.title: What A Long Strange Trip It's Been
item.description: Just over four years ago, I impulsively responded to a Facebook post about a devops evangelism role at a new tech startup. I had never been an evangelist and I knew nothing of the term “devops”. #yolo ¯_(ツ)_/¯ This spontaneous act illuminated a path of personal and professional growth. A path that created new opportunities for me almost daily. A path that changed me for the better. A path that wasn’t there… until it was.

item.title: Rethinking Monitoring
item.description: If you’ve been involved in the management and operation of applications and services newly developed in the cloud, it is painfully obvious that the way we’ve monitored our applications and infrastructure in the past isn’t cutting it any more. Disruptions in service are more frequent. The frequency and complexity of change in production enviornments make it nearly impossible to have a grasp on what’s going on with your system.
